name: Baby First Words Flash Cards
description:
Flash Cards with high-quality pictures in HD, sounds, written words and all pronunciation done by professional voice-over actors 

The education and development of your kid has never before been so fun and exciting!
Play, have fun and learn about the world starting from the first few months!

***** 20 Educational Learning Categories***** 
- Color
- Animal
- Fruit
- Vegetable
- Workers 
- Clothes
- Stuff
- Living Room
- Music Gear 
- Kitchen
- Food
- Bedroom
- Numbers 0 to 20
- Camping
- Drinks
- Tools
- Businesses
- Gardening
- Office
- Vehicles

This Application offers the following TWO ENGAGING GAME MODES in which you can play all of the aforementioned learning categories: 

LEARN 
Let’s Learn: In Let’s Learn, children systematically learn the names of objects by browsing through them in either alphabetical or random order. 

PRACTICE
Let’s Practice: In this mode, children test their skills by tapping on picture filled with objects whose name is called. 

This app is fun and the app’s interface is simple enough even for the youngest learners and sure to provide an experience your children will love.
